aka: Lass den Sommer nie wieder kommen
Let the Summer Never Come Again

director.name: 亚历山大·科贝里泽 Aleksandre Koberidze

trans_title: Lass den Sommer nie wieder kommen
Let the Summer Never Come Again
introduction: A young man leaves his village to go into the city to audition to enter a dance company. He then is involved in illegal activities such as boxing and sleeping with men for money. Unwillingly, he falls in love with a man and suddenly is accepted in and starts dancing in the company. But his life will turn upside down when his lover goes to war and he returns to his village.
